job.title: Senior Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: strongAn AI engineering company that creates software solutions that go beyond conventional AI is looking for a Senior Machine Learning Engineer to join their teambrbrstrongThis Jobot Job is hosted by Matt MahoneybrbrAre you a fit Easy Apply now by clicking the Apply button and sending us your resumebrbrSalary 170000  225000 per yearbrbrstrongA Bit About UsbrbrstrongThis is a wellfunded computer software company that was founded in 2014 and raised a 133M Series C last year They are an AIML focused startup servicing the Energy Healthcare and Finance sectors by building industrial AI MVPs and POCs for larger corporations They are looking for a Senior ML Engineer to build modern ML models for their products and work with their software team to deploy and maintain the models in productionbrbrstrongbrbrstrongWhy join usbrbrstrongstrongulli Very competitive Base Salarylili Equitylili Yearly Bonuslili Generous PTOlili Full Healthcare Coverage Medical Dental Visionlili This is an opportunity to join a wellfunded and growing Computer Software startupbrliulstrongJob DetailsbrbrstrongThe ideal candidate has experience withbrulli Pythonlili Tensorflowlili PyTorchlili Keraslili Sparklili AWS or Azure pluslili Cubflow or MLflow plusbrliulInterested in hearing more Easy Apply now by clicking the Apply button
